verbose_text: TAAR1 agonist treatment of striatal or thalamic synaptosomes promotes changes in DAT / SERT and NET kinetic activity, respectively, by promoting PKA and PKC phosphorylation cascades, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR so it is likely that TAAR1 expressed in other brain regions can also promote PKA and PKC signaling cascades upon stimulation.
evidence: TAAR1 agonist treatment of striatal or thalamic synaptosomes promotes changes in DAT/SERT and NET kinetic activity, respectively, by promoting PKA and PKC phosphorylation
